title: I have an Idea for the Riot marketing team
body:
So since you clearly cater your game now to kids and children (don't be mean online, no swear words. like we in 4th grade), also that cancer dynamic Q promoting (everybody is a winner kids, golden stars for trying) & now this kys level client update that look like Ipad game for 7 year olds.

How about you guys distribute Riot RP cards to primary school canteens, so kids can use their lunch money to buy RP cards nd buy skins, since kids dont have easy access to credit cards & paypal etc, that will for sure boost the profit

Also while ur at it work on replacing physical activity/sport sessions in primary schools with league of legends, since league of legions is now a sport aparantly lol
